hasMenuItem.name: Aloo Paratha
hasMenuItem.description: Savor the warmth of North Indian comfort food with our Aloo Paratha.  Immerse yourself in the culinary delight of an unleavened flatbread generously stuffed with spiced mashed potatoes.  Each bite offers a symphony of flavors, as the golden-brown paratha gives way to the hearty and flavorful filling.  Our Aloo Paratha is a wholesome and satisfying experience that captures the essence of homemade goodness.

Come join us, in person or online, to celebrate the Festival of Lights October 31st - November 3rd.

From our family at Himalaya to you and yours, Happy Diwali.  We hope the Festival of Lights brings you abundance, happiness and illuminates all that is possible ðŸª” !  Thank you all for your continued support and making our Diwali brighter !

hasMenuItem.name: Diwali Gift Box:  Dried Fruit and Nuts (4 Assortments)
hasMenuItem.description:
Celebrate Diwali with Our Premium Dry Fruit and Nuts Box !

This festive season, indulge in the finest selection of dry fruits and nuts, perfect for gifting or enjoying with loved ones. Our beautifully curated box includes:

â€¢ Almonds: Crunchy and rich in nutrients, these almonds are perfect for a healthy snack.

â€¢ Cashews: Delightfully creamy and packed with flavor, our cashews are a treat for your taste buds.

â€¢ Pistachios: Enjoy the unique taste and vibrant color of our premium pistachios, a favorite for any occasion.

â€¢ Green Raisins: Sweet and chewy, these green raisins add a touch of natural sweetness to your celebrations.

Each box is elegantly packaged, making it an ideal gift to share the joy and prosperity of Diwali. Order now and add a touch of health and happiness to your festivities !

hasMenuItem.name: Punjabi Biryani
hasMenuItem.description:
Born in the royal kitchens of Mughal India, Biryani was developed in an effort to blend flavors of spicy Indian rice specialties to that of the Persian rice dish called Pilaf.

Come take a journey with our Biryani through the Northwestern region of India, known as Punjab.

hasMenuItem.name: Butter Sauce
hasMenuItem.description: Creamy deliciousness, a symphony of flavours â€” our patrons asked and we're happy to deliver our coveted Butter Sauce.  Enjoyed in our Butter Chicken and Shahi Paneer specialties, now you can savour the standalone star.  Incorporate it into your own creations, use it as a dipping sauce or simply devour alone.  The best part, it's 100% Vegetarian.

review.reviewBody: The Punjabi Biryani is a tasty dish. Nicely seasoned, with enough heat in the spices to keep it interesting. And all that in a good-sized portion. The Garlic Naan was also good, even though it could have done with a bit more garlic.
Delicious and great variety. Nice portions. Pronteh and  Cholay Bhatura are the best.
Been coming to this restaurant since I was a kid and the quality is still the same. Amazing food and quality!
Amazing food and the perfect level of spice!
Great food, great price and service. Customer since mid 90s.
